ONE DAY (4th of July) SALE!
Angerville, Bachelet, Barthod, Conterno, Drouhin, Hirtzberger,
Egon M=C3=BCller, FX Pichler, Pr=C3=BCm, Veuve Clicquot...
-----------------------------------------------------------------
ORDERS *ONLY* TAKEN BY EMAIL!!!
FIRST COME, FIRST SERVED!!!

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Some early fireworks for your holiday.
-----------------------------------------------------------------

A finely curated list of the greatest winemakers/bottles in the
world (with an obvious focus on Burgundy) marked way, way down
for one day only.

We'll be closing early today, at 7pm, and when we do, that's it
 - SALE OVER.                                   =20

So let's get to it - just a few things to keep in mind as you
peruse the list below.

1) WE WILL ONLY BE TAKING ORDERS VIA EMAIL - THE ONLY WAY TO
ORDER IS TO REPLY TO THIS EMAIL! This way we can log exactly
when orders come in and allocate first come, first served.
NO WEB ORDERS, NO PHONE ORDERS, NO EXCEPTIONS!=20

2) Please give us your payment information. If you have credit
cards on file, let us know which one to use. We cannot hold wine
without payment information!=20

3) All sales are final - no exceptions.

4) While the wine is all in stock, we'll need a few days to pack
it up, so nothing will be available for pickup or delivery until
next Monday, July 11th.

That's all. So enjoy the savings, enjoy the holiday.

AND REMEMBER, THE ONLY WAY TO ORDER IS TO REPLY TO THIS EMAIL!

Robert Schagrin
Managing Partner
Crush Wine & Spirits

-----------------------------------------------------------------
4th of July Cellar
-----------------------------------------------------------------

<p>A finely curated list of the greatest winemakers/bottles in the world =
(with an obvious focus on Burgundy) marked way, <em>way</em> down for one=

<p>So let's get to it - just a few things to keep in mind as you peruse t=
he list below.</p>
<p><strong>1) </strong><u><strong>WE WILL ONLY BE TAKING ORDERS VIA EMAIL=
 - THE ONLY WAY TO ORDER IS TO REPLY TO THIS EMAIL!</strong></u> This way=
 we can log exactly when orders come in and allocate first come, first se=
rved. <em>NO WEB ORDERS, NO PHONE ORDERS, NO EXCEPTIONS! </em></p>
<p>2) Please give us your payment information. If you have credit cards o=
n file, let us know which one to use. <strong>We cannot hold wine without=
 payment information! </strong></p>
<p>3) <strong>All sales are final</strong> - no exceptions.</p>
<p>4) While the wine is all in stock, we'll need a few days to pack it up=
, so <strong>nothing will be available for pickup or delivery until next =
Monday, July 11th.</strong></p>
<p>That's all. So enjoy the savings, enjoy the holiday.</p>
<p>And, remember: <strong>THE ONLY WAY TO ORDER IS TO REPLY TO THIS EMAIL=
!</strong></p>

"top" align=3D"left">

ve you. We want to customize our email correspondence to best
                                                    fit your needs by com=
municating with you as often as you prefer. If at any time
                                                    you would like to cha=
nge the frequency of emails from us or unsubscribe from this
                                                    list please

shwinespirits.createsend1.com=
/t/r/u/junzl/=

pcdjykf=
/r/">click here</a>.</p>

h Logo are trademarks and/or service marks of Crush Wine & Spirits Inc.  =
                                                   and are registered in =
the United States and may be registered in other jurisdictions           =
                                                  including international=
ly. All other trademarks are not owned by Crush Wine & Spirits, Inc.     =
                                                 and are the property of =
their respective owners, who may or may not be affiliated with,          =
                                                connected to, or sponsore=
d by us. &copy;2007 Crush Wine & Spirits, Inc. New York, NY - All        =

                                <tr>
                                    <td width=3D"655">
                                        <table width=3D"623" height=3D"65=
" border=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"10" cellpadding=3D"0" style=3D"color:#8A8A8=
A;line-height:12px;font-size:10px;font-family:Verdana;" >
                                            <tr>
                                                <td valign=3D"top" align=3D=
"left" width=3D"201">
                                                    <b>Shipping / Deliver=
y Fine Print</b><br />
                                                    <br />
                                                    1. Availability of al=
l wine pending phone or email confirmation.<br />
                                                    2. We are pleased to =
offer free local delivery with purchases of $50 or more. There
                                                    is a $150 minimum for=
 free delivery to non-local addresses south of 96th street
                                                    in Manhattan and a $2=
00 minimum for free delivery to non-local addresses north of
                                                    96th street in Manhat=
tan. Maps and guidelines for delivery to Brooklyn, Queens,
                                                    Staten Island and the=
 Bronx are outlined <a href=3D"http://crushwinespirits.createsend1.com=
/t/r/l/junzl/=
pcdjykf=
/ir/">
                                                        here</a>. Orders =
not meeting the minimum are subject to a delivery charge. Please
                                                    note that delivery mi=
nimums are subject to change during Crush sale events.<br />
                                                    3. Deliveries within =
Manhattan will be made the next business day if your order
                                                    is placed by noon. We=
 will make our best efforts to deliver all "Neighborhood" deliveries
                                                    on the same day. Deli=
very to Westchester, the Hamptons etc. is periodic - please
                                                    call for our regular =
schedule.<br />
                                                </td>
                                                <td  width=3D"1" style=3D=
"border-right-width:1px;border-right-style:solid;border-right-color:#DDDE=
ED;" >
                                                    &nbsp;
                                                </td>
                                                <td width=3D"201" valign=3D=
"top" align=3D"left">
                                                    4. If wine is shipped=
 to you, we contract with a 3rd party carrier who will ship
                                                    wine that you have al=
ready purchased. Ownership of any Wine that Crush sells changes
                                                    hands at the time of =
purchase in the state of New York and is subject to sales tax
                                                    in this state. By req=
uesting that your wine be shipped to you, you are authorizing
                                                    us to engage a common=
 carrier to deliver your wine on your behalf. Crush Wine &
                                                    Spirits is not respon=
sible for any breakage or damage of wine by said common carrier.
                                                    WE MAKE NO REPRESENTA=
TION TO THE LEGAL RIGHTS OF ANYONE TO SHIP OR IMPORT WINES
                                                    INTO ANY STATES OUTSI=
DE OF NEW YORK. You, the buyer, are solely responsible for
                                                    shipment of alcoholic=
 beverage products and assume all obligations for compliance
                                                    with your State's law=
s.<br />
                                                    5. We do not profit o=
n shipping. All shipping charges cover styrofoam shippers,
                                                    3rd party carrier cha=
rges, and nominal labor to pack and deliver your wine for shipment
                                                    to the 3rd party carr=
ier.<br />
                                                </td>
                                                <td  width=3D"1" style=3D=
"border-right-width:1px;border-right-style:solid;border-right-color:#DDDE=
ED;" >
                                                    &nbsp;
                                                </td>
                                                <td width=3D"201" valign=3D=
"top" align=3D"left">
                                                    6. We do not sell win=
e we don&rsquo;t own and we guarantee the deliver of all pre-arrival
                                                    wine; we cannot, howe=
ver, guarantee the exact arrival date due to shipping circumstances
                                                    beyond our control.<b=
r />
                                                    7. We are happy to ho=
ld your wine, free of charge, until the appropriate shipping
                                                    season. To keep our p=
rices as sharp as possible however, we cannot store customer
                                                    wine beyond the appro=
priate shipping season. We therefore reserve the right to charge
                                                    $10 per month, per ca=
se, for wine that has not been taken during the first appropriate
                                                    shipping season. <a h=
ref=3D"http://crushwinespirits.createsend1.com=
/t/r/l/junzl/=
pcdjykf=
/iy/">Click here</a>
                                                    for more.<br />
                                                    8. Alcoholic beverage=
s may be sold and delivered only to persons who are at least
                                                    21 years old. In plac=
ing your order, you represent to us that you are at least 21
                                                    years old and that th=
e person to whom the delivery will be made is at least 21 years
                                                    old.<br />
                                                </td>

                        </td>
